nodes.text: The Crecsent was an Alderaanian passenger freighter owned by Nuun Pargen.

The Crescent took off Naboo in 32 BBY with passengers onboard. While it was trying to leave the planet, it was attacked and damaged by Trade Federation Droid starfighters, the ship's captain, Nuun Pargen, managed to make an emergency landing outside the city of Theed, on the Great Grass Plains.
